content.question: A solid is tested in a laboratory to determine its properties. Which of the following provides the best evidence to support the hypothesis that the solid is a metal as opposed to a nonmetal?

choices.label: It has a high melting point <math alttext="(1700 degrees Celsius)" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mn>1700</mn><mo>Â°</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math>.

It has the same density as aluminum <math alttext="(2.7 grams per milliliter)" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mn>2.7</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>/</mo><mi>mL</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math>.

skill.text: 2.B: Formulate a hypothesis or predict the results of an experiment.
